text: Hi, my request is still under review, can anyone help me?
Hi <@U0429V78FDK> - the ability to sync a sandbox to production was a beta that we rolled back a few months ago. I’m curious though, what specifically were you looking to sync back to production?

Yeah, I noticed that too. I was hoping I was just missing something and they moved it somewhere else or something. :( Theme code changes in this case. We’d love to sync pages from prod to sandbox and vice versa as well, and I hear they’re working on that, or it’s planned at least.
Thank you Dustin, that’s good context.
